revised_title: Electrolysis of Secondary Compounds: A Second Letter to Michael Faraday
tldr: J. Frederic Daniell wrote a second letter to Michael Faraday discussing the electrolysis of secondary compounds. He shared his findings on the behavior of these compounds during electrolysis and provided insights into the efficiency of different electrolytes. This letter contributed to the understanding of the electrochemical processes and the development of new techniques in the field.
